text: yahi wo hai jis ki bashaarath Allah ta’ala apne un bandho ko de raha hai, jo imaan laaye aur (sunnath ke mutaabiq) nek amal kiye, to keh djiye ke main us par tum se koyi badhla nahi chaahta, magar muhabbath rishtedaari ki, jo shaqs koyi neki kare, hum us ke liye us ki neki mein aur neki bada denge, beshak Allah ta’ala bahuth baqshne waala (aur) bahuth qadardaan hai
